DataElement.preferredName: Person Specimen Other Disease or Disorder Future Research Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the patient has agreed to use of specimens for prevention.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Specimen Other Disease or Disorder Future Research
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to consent or permission of a person to use a blood or tissue specimen for future research on other abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

Property.preferredName: Specimen Other Disease or Disorder Future Research Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Not otherwise specified.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A time that is yet to come.:Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A time that is yet to come.
Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has given permission
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store blood and paraffin-embedded tissue for future research to prevent, or treat other health problems

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Patient Consent Ind-2 2018303v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
